title: Can someone help me to find the name of this font ?
author: moniquev

comments.content:
This seems like the italic of some familiar type, and it might even be a serif font (notice the serifs on the s's). The shape of the y is also very familiar to me, but I can't name it. The letter that seems out of place is the P. Does this come from a web site?

- Mike Yanega

The lettering reminds me of Tartine Script

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701152933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TartineScriptWithExtraSpacing_3730.jpg)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/tartine-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701152933/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/tartine-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/tartine-script/")  
with the connecting strokes clipped and a fair amount of editing.  
Don
No it is the logo of a public community. Thanks for your help
